thread.title: Future Joins Ariana Grande For Raunchy “Everyday” Visuals
thread.title_full: Future Joins Ariana Grande For Raunchy “Everyday” Visuals

author: Jacob Davey
title: Future Joins Ariana Grande For Raunchy “Everyday” Visuals
text:
Ariana Grande and Future have united for a hyper-sexualized new video for “Everyday,” from Grande’s album, Dangerous Woman . The video takes intimacy to new levels, with a host of couples fully going at it with each other on buses, cars and in offices as Future and Ariana sing along while observing all the action. It provides for some hilarious reactions from those watching on within the video, as you can watch above.
Future has stayed ridiculously proactive of late, having dropped two albums in the space of a week and starring in several other ridiculous videos, such as “Draco,” which you can watch below.

In other music news, Lil Uzi Vert has dropped four new tracks, which you can listen to here .
